main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted near Maupin, Oregon on June 27, 1964.
interesting points: The object was described as bright orange in color., It was maneuverable and observed through binoculars three times., The sighting lasted for about 2 minutes., The object moved to the east, stopped, hovered, and then disappeared at a high rate of speed., No further details were provided, leading to evaluations of insufficient information.
witness description: John Seers, a resident of Maupin, Oregon
